articles.title: 'Avoid opening legs too wide': Chinese netizens horrified at 'hot' pole dance at wedding - AsiaOne
articles.description: Pole dancers at Chinese funerals may have raised eyebrows in the past, but a video of a scantily clad woman sliding up and down a pole at a wedding reception has prompted fierce online criticism.
